long_description: Time-tested and rider approved, the Vans Encore women's snowboard boots feature easy-to-use Boa(R) lacing and cushioned liners to give your feet a dialed-in fit that lasts from first run to last. Boa Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. Boa lacing offers on-the-fly adjustment and never comes untied; you get consistent closure without pressure points. TriFit-X thermal liners feature asymmetric X-Cage inserts that lock your heels in place; low-volume soles help you feel connected to the board. Fleece-lined upper cuffs offer warmth; flexible toe boxes help the boots feel more like shoes when you're walking or hiking. Cuffs flex easily for enhanced board control when carving; wrap-around design offers a secure closure around your ankles and calves. Instep articulation offers a forgiving forward flex that maintains support. Dual-density EVA footbeds feature integrated arch support and dual-density metatarsal and heel impact-relief pads. Cushioned rubber outsoles feature an inverted waffle tread patten design for increased traction.
short_description: Time-tested and rider approved, the Vans Encore women's snowboard boots feature easy-to-use Boa(R) lacing and cushioned liners to give your feet a dialed-in fit that lasts from first run to last.
